attributes.action: Test all people with symptoms and Limit large gatherings across the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
Firstly, the UK Government should start testing more people in order to publish the real number of people infected. 
Secondly, UK Government should start the following actions in order to limit large gatherings: cancel upcoming events/festivals; introduce new rules in restaurants, pubs, cinemas, indoor/outdoor markets; and more places; encourage home working; close schools, colleges, and universities; encourage old people to stay safe at home, more controls in all airports.
attributes.background: We would like to ask UK Government to take necessary actions to prevent further spread of COVID-19.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for these actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300403
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300628
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300885
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301397
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301439

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
